items.description: Describes a verb and its morphological features

lemma.description: The base form of the verb (e.g., 'go' for 'went').

auxiliary.description: The base form of the auxiliary verb (where applicable).

modal.description: True if the verb is a modal verb.

finite.description: True if the verb is conjugated in a finite form.

mood.description: The verb mood (only for finite verb forms).

tense.description: The verb tense (only for finite verb forms).

aspect.description: The verb aspect (only for finite verb forms).

voice.description: The verb voice (only for finite verb forms).

verb_form.description: The verb form (only for non-finite verb forms).
